```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
penguins |> ggplot(aes(x = body_mass_g, y = flipper_length_mm, color= species  )) + 
  geom_point() +
  labs(title="Penguins Body Mass compared to Flipper Length", x="Body Mass", y = "Flipper Length" )
```
